hero.title: Test Your Digital Resilience in a Safe Environment
hero.description: Experience real-world cyber threats in a controlled environment. Learn to identify and defend against deepfakes, disinformation, cyberbullying, and catfishing attacks.

threats.sectionTitle: Cyber Threats You'll Learn to Identify
threats.sectionDescription: Our interactive challenges simulate real-world scenarios to help you recognize and respond to today's most common cyber threats.

deepfakes.title: Deepfakes
deepfakes.description: AI-generated content that can convincingly impersonate real people

disinformation.title: Disinformation
disinformation.description: False information deliberately spread mainly in social media to deceive other people

cyberbullying.title: Cyberbullying
cyberbullying.description: Using digital platforms to harass, threaten, or intimidate others

catfishing.title: Catfishing
catfishing.description: Creating fake online identities to deceive others into relationships

howItWorks.sectionDescription: Our platform provides a safe environment to experience and learn from simulated cyber threats.

step1.title: Take the Challenge
step1.description: Choose from various scenarios that simulate real-world cyber threats.

step2.title: Test Your Skills
step2.description: Navigate through interactive challenges designed to test your ability to identify threats.

step3.title: Learn & Improve
step3.description: Get instant feedback and actionable tips to improve your cyber awareness.

cta.title: Ready to Test Your Cyber Resilience?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who have strengthened their cyber awareness through our interactive challenges.

dialog.title: Choose Your Challenge
dialog.description: Select a challenge type to test your cyber awareness skills in different scenarios.

brand.tagline: Building Digital Resilience Through Interactive Learning
brand.description: CyberCompass empowers users to recognize and defend against modern cyber threats in a safe, controlled environment.

submitQuestion.title: Submit a Question
submitQuestion.success: Question submitted successfully! It will be reviewed by our team.
submitQuestion.error: Failed to submit question. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to the admin panel. Here you can review submitted questions and manage the platform.

actions.reviewQuestionsDesc: Review and approve submitted questions from users.
actions.manageAdminsDesc: Add or remove admin users and manage permissions.

users.title: Manage Admins
users.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this admin?
users.manageAdminsDesc: Add or remove admin users and manage permissions.

errors.noPermission: You don't have permission to manage admins
errors.userNotFound: User with this email not found
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.addFailed: Failed to add admin. Please try again.
errors.removeFailed: Failed to remove admin. Please try again.
errors.updateFailed: Failed to update permissions. Please try again.

status.detailedReports: View detailed reports and system metrics.

profile.title: Welcome back, {name}!
profile.subtitle: Track your cybersecurity learning progress and achievements
profile.keepLearning: Keep learning to earn your first badge!
profile.completeMoreChallenges: Complete more challenges to see your trend
profile.tip1: Focus on your weakest areas first for maximum improvement
profile.tip2: Maintain consistent daily practice to build lasting habits
profile.tip3: Review incorrect answers to understand common patterns
profile.keepPracticing: Keep practicing to improve your scores
profile.startLearning: Start completing challenges to see your history
profile.onFireMessage: You're on fire! Keep this amazing streak going!
profile.goodStreakMessage: Great consistency! You're building excellent habits.
profile.keepGoingMessage: Every step counts! Keep building your cyber awareness.
profile.privacyDescription: Your data is anonymized in shared reports and exports.
profile.sharedProfileNotice: You are viewing someone else's shared profile. Only signed-in users can access shared profiles.
